summary: Built a premium Japanese restaurant website for Koizi Endless Hibachi & Sushi. Next.js 16 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS 4 with full dark theme. 9 sections: Hero (Ken Burns zoom, dual CTAs), Concept (split-screen with stats), Menu (7 tabbed categories with 50+ real items), Reviews (4.2 rating carousel), Gallery (masonry grid with Unsplash images), Locations (2x2 grid with 4 FL locations), Ordering CTA (simplemenu + delivery platforms), About (founding story), Footer (3-column). All real business data, zero placeholders. CSS consistency enforced: section-padding on every section, max-w-6xl containers, CSS variables for all colors, no hardcoded hex. SEO-optimized with JSON-LD restaurant schema. Mobile-responsive. WCAG AA accessible.
